prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a beautiful young woman standing center, pure white background, anime style, Japanese animation style, vibrant colors, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words. A female detective assistant in Victorian London, 1895. She has an extremely high-visage, delicate and elegant facial features: an oval face with fair, porcelain skin, large expressive eyes with long eyelashes, a slender and straight nose, and full rosy lips with a gentle, observant expression. Her hair is styled in an intricate updo typical of the late Victorian era, with soft chestnut brown strands elegantly pinned up, revealing her graceful neck, and a few artful tendrils framing her face. She wears a tailored, ankle-length walking dress in a deep emerald green wool, with a high neckline, leg-of-mutton sleeves that puff at the shoulders and taper to the wrists, and a fitted bodice that accentuates her waist. The dress is adorned with subtle black velvet trim along the collar, cuffs, and the front closure. Over the dress, she wears a matching short jacket of the same material and color. Her attire is completed with practical yet stylish black leather ankle boots, and she carries a small, structured leather satchel for investigation tools. Her posture is poised and alert, reflecting her role as an observer and assistant. The overall impression is one of refined beauty, intelligence through attentive demeanor, and perfect adaptation to the historical setting., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: anime
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:

No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
